Supported Instruments¶

This section of the documentation lists all of the supported devices for which models exist. The models are organized by vendor and device type.

Agilent¶

Function Generator¶

  • 33521A

Multimeter¶

  • 34411A

Source-Measurement Unit (SMU)¶

  • B2901A
  • B2902A

BK Precision¶

DC Load¶

  • 8502
  • 8510
  • 8512

DC Source¶

  • 9116
  • XLN30052

Function Generator¶

  • 4063

Multimeter¶

  • 2831E
  • 5492B

Chroma¶

Source¶

  • 61602 AC Source
  • 62024P-600-8 DC Source

TDI Power¶

Load¶

  • XBL-600-100-2000

Tektronix¶

Oscilloscopes¶

Mixed Signal:

MSO5204
